mapper.select: select create_date, sum(num) as num, sum(row_count) as row_count, sum(tbl_col_num) as tbl_col_num from (select create_date, num, num * row_count as row_count, num * tbl_col_num as tbl_col_num from (select create_date, tbl_name, count(*) as num from met_explore_task group by create_date, tbl_name) t1 left join met_data_table t2 on t1.tbl_name = t2.tbl_name) t3 group by create_date order by create_date limit #{limit};

select sum(num) as total_tables , sum(row_count) as total_rows , sum(tbl_col_num) as total_columns from (select num, num * row_count as row_count, num * tbl_col_num as tbl_col_num from (select tbl_name, count(*) as num from met_explore_task group by tbl_name) t1 left join met_data_table t2 on t1.tbl_name = t2.tbl_name) t3

select ifnull(sum(num),0) as today_tables , ifnull(sum(row_count),0) as today_rows , ifnull(sum(tbl_col_num),0) as today_columns from (select num, num * row_count as row_count, num * tbl_col_num as tbl_col_num from (select tbl_name, count(*) as num from met_explore_task where create_date= current_date() group by tbl_name) t1 left join met_data_table t2 on t1.tbl_name = t2.tbl_name) t3
